title: What are the best sites to write Science articles for? - Quora

response.answer_text: You might want to check out Write for us – Ominy Science, Guide for freelancers | New Scientist Your article has to be of high quality if you want your article to get approved. Ominy science allows you to sign up, create a profile and submit your posts instantly. These submitted posts will still need to be review to be published. New scientists would pay you some cash if your post makes it through the review process. Good luck
